type.name: staticRoute
type.documentation: StaticRoute represents the static route data that is returned as a response to the NorthBound GET request.

element.documentation: The name of the static route.
The prefix for the route. Format: A.B.C.D/MM Where A.B.C.D is the Default Gateway IP (L3) or ARP Querier IP (L2)
NextHop IP-Address (or) datapath ID/port list: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx/a,b,c-m,r-t,y

group.name: StaticRoutingNorthbound
group.documentation:
Static Routing Northbound API allows for the management of the static routes.


An example request/response for retrieving the static routes may look like this: 
GET http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/staticroute/default HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{ "staticRoute":[
"name":"route-1",
"prefix":"10.10.1.0/24",
"nextHop":"1.1.1.1"
]
}


Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS
